ygData.subject: RE: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: *chuckle* Yea, and Alchemy will be implimented and Shaman s will get that new spell we were promised replacing Charm.... *chuckle* Please, I would love to get
ygData.messageBody:
*chuckle* Yea, and Alchemy will be implimented and Shaman's will get that
new spell we were promised replacing Charm.... *chuckle* Please, I would
love to get happy about them fixing and finishing stuff....just hasn't been
a good track record for shaman promises though...

Is Identify an Enchanter spell? If so, then it should be replaced by a good
one ;-)

-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [mailto:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: October 11, 1999 1:30 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] JBoots, Rubi & Beyond


From: MFerrulo@...

In a message dated 10/11/99 1:49:19 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
cobb@... writes:

<<
I have never tried it on other people, but I don't see why it wouldn't
work on them either.
>>

Well I wouldn't assume this. Hardly any of our spells work on other people.

Does it make sense that we can cast See Invisi on others but not Heat Sight?

Also, keep in mind that Identify Magic spell is gonna be taken out of the
game soon and replaced with a new spell (all who have Identify magic will
auto recieve new spell I think).

Wizaro Wrathcaster
28th Flame of Solusek's Fire
